item.title: Accidental painting
item.description: I was editing a photo, experimenting a little with the noise reduction slider and… I made a painting: [caption id="" align="alignnone" width="1500.0"]![ Thessaloniki, Greece ](/images/2014-03-17-20143accidental-painting/image-asset.jpeg) Thessaloniki, Greece [/caption]
